name: Coconut Blaster Super Remix!!!
description:
A TROPICAL MULTIPLAYER EXPERIENCE! 

Blast each other with coconuts before the timer runs out or until one player is completely obliterated! 

Use the unique & devastating power-ups to gain an advantage against your rival! 

Can be played with either the Keyboard or Xbox controllers!

Can only be played with two players! (For now!)

(IMPORTANT NOTE: Please lower volume when starting a match, especially when wearing headphones. A slightly louder version of Lavanut Explosion Sound Effect briefly plays as soon as the level starts.)

CREDITS:

Programming, Art, Assets, UI, Controls, Main Level Design, Menu Design, Power-Ups, Music Composition, Sound Effects, and Intro Cinematic by Jackson Lawrence-Yannicelli.

Research, Trello Page Arrangement, Creative Input, Team Management & Representation, and Tutorial Level by Jose Olivera.

PROGRAMS USED:

Construct 2, Adobe Photoshop, Adobe After Effects, Piskelapp.com, Bosca Ceoil, Bfxr.net
